top_comment.author: Rayra Lareska

comments.text:
+Rayra Lareska
O mesmo apóstolo Paulo que lhe fala em romanos também profere em coríntios 
as palavras a seguir.
"Todo o homem que ora ou profetiza, tendo a cabeça coberta, desonra a sua 
própria cabeça. Mas toda a mulher que ora ou profetiza com a cabeça 
descoberta, desonra a sua própria cabeça, porque é como se estivesse 
rapada." - 1 Coríntios 11:4-5
"O homem, pois, não deve cobrir a cabeça, porque é a imagem e glória de 
Deus, mas a mulher é a glória do homem." - 1 Coríntios 11:7

Quanto a levítico, vejamos algumas outras coisas que são banidas neste 
livro:
- Comer gordura (3:17)
- Tocar algum animal sujo (5:2)
- Deixar seu cabelo despenteado/descuidado (10:6)
- Rasgar suas roupas (10:6)
- Comer – ou tocar o casco de – qualquer comida marinha sem barbatanas ou 
escamas (11:10-12) - Comer – ou tocar o casco de – águias, urubus, alguns 
tipos de papagaio, alguns tipos de corujas, gaivota, falcão, morcegos e 
alguns outros. (11:13-19) - Várias outras impedindo de comer ou tocar 
vários outros tipos de animais: (11:20-22), (11:27), (11:29), (11:41-42). - 
Ir para igreja após 33 dias de ter dado a luz a um menino (12:4)
- Ir para igreja após 66 dias de ter dado a luz a um menina (12:5)
- Fazer sexo com uma mulher durante sua menstruação (18:19)
- Colher nas margens/bordas de um campo (19:9)
- Ajuntar uvas que caíram no seu vinhedo (19:10)
- Fazer uma roupa de tecidos distintos (19:19)
- Plantar diferentes tipos de sementes no mesmo campo (19:19)
- Aparar a barba (19:27)
- Cortar seu cabelo nos lados (19:27)
- Fazer tatuagens (19:28)
- Trabalhar no sábado (23:3)
- Vender uma terra permanentemente (25:23)

Espero que estejas sendo coerente na tua maneira de interpretar a bíblia, e 
não simplesmente escolhendo acreditar no que lhe convém. Ou então você pode 
começar a interpretar a bíblia frente a um contexto histórico, e não de 
maneira literal.

captions.text:
"Improbable Musical",
everyone plays!

How does it work? They'll have
to sing and dance and act

and convince us that we're watching
a Broadway musical! Or not.

Who's reading a new book here?
Please.

- 'The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas'.
- Okay, I'll use 'striped pyjamas'.

That's the title for
"Improbable Musical", starting now.
Marli!
What is this?

That's a pyjama of yours
that I washed.

- Marli, this... This isn't mine, Marli.
- Oh, it isn't?

Marli, did anyone come here
while I was travelling, Marli?

Well, I ain't no gossiper...
The missus told me to stay quiet!

But someone came here...
Some real estate broker...
He ended up sleeping here.

So, in the next day...
I washed his pyjamas.

To be nice, right?
I try to be nice!

A man sleeping in here isn't bad enough,
so you wash his pyjamas?
But he smells so good, look...
My, he's so fuckin' hot!

That man is so hot,
he got into my head

If I could, I would
get him into my bed

That man is so hot,
you couldn't ignore

But it was the missus
that screamed for more
I was here waiting by the clock
To look into his eyes give him a talk

To get into my room
and do something nasty

But he didn't want...
He went away
You betrayers

- You and my spouse
- Come on

Washing his pyjamas
inside my house

- Sorry, chief
- Sorry about what?
Didn't mean to cause you grief
I apologize again

Don't fire me, I have a family
and I'm feeling pain.

- What did you tell him? You madwoman!
- I didn't say anything!

- Madwoman! You're a madwoman!
- Mrs. Luiza!

I've got a crooked tooth already,
mrs. Luiza, don't do this!
He's my boss too, c'mon!

He asked me and I answered,
I thought it was his pyjamas!

I need to get out of here!
That man is insane!

- Are you going away? Leaving the house?
- We're both leaving!
Me?
Can I go?
I'm nervous, let me answer it!

- Hello?
- Hey, babe...

- My pyjamas are still there?
- I told you not to call!
Isn't your husband travelling?

He isn't travelling, he knows
everything, I need to run away!

What do you mean, he knows?
Who told him?

- He was told...
- I was me, hot stuff, I told him!

I'll have to go to your place,
I can't stay here anymore!
Fine, come here... I'll get you.
Thank you!
The hook is over there!

I have to clean everybody's
mess in this house!

- I'm so glad you came!
- Come on!
Let's go.
To Paris!

I'd like a rocket launcher, too...
Yes...

I'd like a rocket launcher.
Yeah.

And maybe a war tank.
I guess a tank is good enough.

- What is this, huh?
- Do you have something bigger?

- What are you doing here?
- I followed you!

- To tell you the missus went...
- What?
Yup. The missus went...

You got it?
The missus went...

Marli... Are you trying to say
that my wife went...
I'm gonna find her, Marli...
I wouldn't do that if I were you...

It's useless, pointless...
She went...

She must be far away now,
I came here on foot...
There, he won't recognize us like this!

Marli, I already bought
a lot of weapons.

If he ever gets in my sight,
I'll give him a fight

If he ever shows up here,
I won't show fear, I won't show fear
But my husband got here by plane
I guess I escaped in vain
He found me in a split
And I told myself I'm in deep sh...

- I'm here with guns by my side
- Guns by his side

- I'm here and Marli came for the ride
- Yeah, I came too...
And he tied me
And blackmailed me
And threatened me

- I'll kill you, motherfucker!
- And he cursed at me
And I said 'stop'
Please, stop
Don't do anything, stop
I'm here, stop
Stoooop... Stop!
I'm here to kill you both!
Kill me, it's not her fault!

- I came to show a house...
- You came... A house...

Suddenly, I saw her at the garden...
You know the rest...

- Yeah, I know... - So I went to visit
her garden, what's the problem?
Was everything watered there?

- Marli, I told you to...
- Were the bushes trimmed, the grass cut?
Marli, I'm gonna kill you...
It's not her fault!

- Of course, she doesn't wax
my wife! - No, her!

- Not her fault? - Kill me, you'll have
your revenge and it's over!

- That's very noble of you,
but I'll kill... - Do it.

- Get out of the way, honey?
- Enough!

- I want to kill him first!
- I was going to tell you...

- Really? - I was ending our relationship
because I know about your relationships!

- What?
- What?
Shut up, Marli...

- So this is Marli?
- I knew about your affair with Marli!

So I went for an adventure.
I picked up the first man I saw!

- I thought you loved me! - Well, I knew
there was no criteria in that choice!

- Wait! - You were
just a tool for my vengeance!
But the vengeance was actually mine.
What, Marli?

- Marli, don't say anything!
- I'm gonna talk!

We can still be together,
don't say anything!
Oh, my God!
I can't take this anymore!
Goodbye, cruel world!
Twice betrayed!

- Our plan succe...
- Deal with it!
Marli...
I don't know how to use this stuff...

- We made it, Marli!
- Thank God, mrs. Luiza!

Wow, mrs. Luiza,
your boobs are huge...

Don't depreciate me,
I'm triyng to lose weight!

- Our plan worked out!
- Yeah!

The men are gone, the money
is with me and we are in Paris!

Isn't it romantic? There's that thing
over there, some pretty stuff...

- Marli, we can build our family here.
- I don't know how, but...
We're tired of all that drama

We like to be the whole day
in our pyjamas
We have love, we have romance
That's why we killed them in France
It's hard to be a lesbian in Brazil

But in Paris that's
a dream we can fulfill

- In the morning
- In the morning
They will always love each other
And forever they will do...
Shag-la-la-la...

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

- Stop! Stop! Stop!
- Lampião! Lampião!
